import React from'react';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';// import ShowInfo from './ShowInfo';
export default function Film(_ref){var film=_ref.film;var history=useHistory();return React.createElement("button",{className:"film",type:"button",style:{cursor:'pointer'},onClick:function onClick(){history.push({pathname:"/films/".concat(film.episode_id)});}},film.title);}
